display_title.display_title:
Mauritius - Second Structural

repnme.cdata!:
Mauritius - Second Structural Adjustment
            Loan Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Structural Adjustment Project
            will finance essential imports and support the second phase
            of the Government's structural adjustment program which
            aims at improving the balance of payments position in the
            medium term while accelerating the growth of output and
            employment. The second phase of the program includes: (i) a
            program for export-led industrialization; (ii) a program for
            tourism development; (iii) a program for agricultural
            diversification; (iv) measures to promote employment; and
            (v) policies to improve public resource management. The
            program is described in the Government's Statement of
            Development Policy to the Bank.
